detailsData.title: Award-Winning
detailsData.content: Choose a trial law firm with a proven record of success. McDonald Worley has been recognized for its outstanding legal services and achievements.

detailsData.title: Nationwide Service
detailsData.content: Providing legal services to injured individuals across the United States, McDonald Worley is dedicated to advocating for the rights of its clients, regardless of their location.

detailsData.title: Diverse Practice Areas
detailsData.content: From auto accidents to wrongful death, medical malpractice, and class action claims, McDonald Worley offers a wide range of legal services to meet the needs of its clients.

detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: With a team of highly skilled attorneys, McDonald Worley combines modern technology, legal experience, and diligence to fight for the justice and compensation their clients deserve.

address: 1770 St. James Place Suite 100 Houston, Texas 77056
valueProp: Experience the drama, the passion, and the unexpected twists and turns of twelve high-profile civil cases as attorney Don Worley takes you behind the scenes and shares his unique perspective on the legal process.
